parameter.name: email
parameter.label: Email
parameter.description: Email address for logging in to Gardena Smart Home

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password for logging in to Gardena Smart Home

parameter.name: apiKey
parameter.label: API Key
parameter.description: The Gardena Smart Home API key

parameter.name: sessionTimeout
parameter.label: Session Timeout
parameter.description: The timeout in minutes for a session to Gardena Smart Home

parameter.name: connectionTimeout
parameter.label: Connection Timeout
parameter.description: The timeout in seconds for connections to Gardena Smart Home

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds for refreshing the data from Gardena Smart Home

parameter.name: websocketIdleTimeout
parameter.label: WebSocket Idle Timeout in Seconds
parameter.description: The WebSocket is the connection to the Gardena service that listens to status updates. If no data is received over the websocket connection for the given time, the websocket will reconnect. 0 will disable the idle timeout. Default is 900 seconds (15 minutes).
